data.homeworkTitle: 第七章 手术前后病人的护理

questions.title: 病人，男，20岁。因“头部外伤”急诊入院。浅昏迷，CT提示颅内血肿，脑挫裂伤，在全麻下行颅内血肿清除术。术后第2天采取此卧位的目的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"预防脑水肿","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"利于呼吸","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"促进引流","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"便于观察瞳孔","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"促进排痰","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 临时决定手术延期的情况不包括
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"体温升高","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"血压升高","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"手术区出现皮疹","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"腹痛加重","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"妇女月经来潮","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 术后腹部切口全层裂开的紧急处理，正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"无菌敷料覆盖切口","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"无菌敷料填塞切口","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"立即将脱出的肠管或网膜送回腹腔","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"腹带加压包扎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"床旁重新缝合切口","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 为了预防术后肺不张，下列措施不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"术后鼓励病人深呼吸、有效咳嗽","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"防止呕吐物的吸入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"为防止咳嗽时胸部伤口疼痛，胸带包扎要紧","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"协助病人早期活动，卧床病人进行床上活动","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"保持足够的水份摄入，以利于稀释呼吸道分泌物","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，35岁。因突发上腹痛1小时来诊，伴恶心、呕吐，既往有胃十二指肠溃疡病史，糖尿病病史。i查体:全腹压痛，肌紧张，板状腹，肝浊音界消失，立位腹平片示膈下游离气体，初步诊断:胃十二指肠溃疡穿孔，拟行手术治疗。如该病人经必要准备后应立刻手术治疗，则此属于
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"择期手术","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"限期手术","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"急症手术","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"姑息性手术","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"诊断性手术","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 手术人员手臂刷洗消毒后，手臂应保持的姿势是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"双手放置背后","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"手臂向前伸","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"胸前拱手姿势","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"手臂自然下垂","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"手臂向上高举","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，20岁。因“头部外伤”急诊入院。浅昏迷，CT提示颅内血肿，脑挫裂伤，在全麻下行颅内血肿清除术。术后第2天，病人应采取的体位是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"头低足高位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"俯卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"头高足低","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"中凹卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"半卧位。","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 下列关于刷手方法的叙述错误的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"用无菌刷从手指尖刷到肘上10cm处","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"流水冲洗时手的位置要低于肘部","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"刷手后双手上举于胸前","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"擦过肘部的无菌巾不得再擦手部","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"消毒后的手臂被有菌物污染后应重新刷手","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，19岁。在硬膜外麻醉下行左腹股沟斜疝修补术。恰当的术后饮食护理是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"术后应禁食48小时","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"术后即进普食","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"术后应胃肠减压","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"术后应静脉供给营养3天","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"若术后6小时无恶心即可进流食","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 术前呼吸道准备中错误的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"戒烟2周","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"指导病人进行深呼吸和有效排痰法的训练","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"有呼吸道感染及时给予抗生素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"痰液粘稠者给予雾化吸入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"咳嗽者给予镇咳药物","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 手术时皮肤消毒范围至少距切口多少厘米以上
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"10cm","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"15cm","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"20cm","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"25cm","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"30cm","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，女，51岁。因转移性右下腹疼痛3日来诊，1小时前突发疼痛加剧，有里急后重感。查体:全腹有压痛，反跳痛，肌紧张，以右下腹为重，麦氏点有压痛。门诊以“急性腹膜炎、阑尾穿孔”收住院。拟急诊行手术治疗。手术中，手术人员的手套污染后应
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"用碘酒消毒","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"用酒精消毒","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"加戴一只无菌手套","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"更换无菌手套","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"重新刷手后再带无菌手套","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 针对高血压病人术前准备时，应该
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"不用降压药物进行特殊处理","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"使用降压药物使血压轻度下降","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"使用降压药物使血压略高于正常","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"使用降压药物使血压降至正常","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"使用降压药物使血压低于正常","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 术后早期出现恶心、呕吐的常见原因为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"颅内压增高","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"低血钾","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"肠梗阻","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"麻醉后胃肠功能紊乱的反应","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"急性胃扩张","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 某实习护士在临床带教老师的指导下正在进行无菌技术操作，其任务为铺无菌盘及戴无菌手套。戴无菌手套时，错误的一项是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"洗手、剪指甲、戴口罩","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"核对手套号码、灭菌日期及包装","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"未戴手套的手持手套的返折部分取出手套","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"戴上手套的手持手套的内面取出手套","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"戴好手套后，双手置于胸前","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，女,31岁。术后24小时突然出现面色苍白、心慌、气短、血压下降，引流管流出大量鲜红色血性液体，考虑病人可能出现
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"内出血","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"切口感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"切口血肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"急性腹膜炎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"切口裂开","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 围术期是指
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"病人从确定手术到进入手术室接受手术前的这段时期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"病人从确定手术到接受手术治疗结束后的这段时期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"病人从确定手术到接受手术后完全康复痊愈后的时期","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"病人从到达手术室实施麻醉到手术结束这段时期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"病人从确定手术到接受手术后完全康复痊愈后的这段时期","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人因胃癌行胃大部切除术，术后1日除生命体征外，护士最应重点观察的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"神志","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"尿量","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"肠鸣音","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"腹胀","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"胃管引流液","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 病人，男，51岁。因胃癌行胃大部切除术后13天，痊愈出院。正确的出院指导是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"绝对卧床休息","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"进流质饮食","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"经常消毒伤口","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"定期回院复查","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"定期针灸理疗","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"减低腹壁张力","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"增加肺的通气量","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"利于脑部血液供应","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"改善腹部血液循环","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"避免膈下脓肿","IsAnswer":false}]
